biblio.service

Class BiblioServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblio.service.BiblioServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BiblioService

    @Service(value="biblioService")
public class BiblioServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BiblioService

    Implements the methods in the BiblioService interface

    It is part of the data service layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohammed Binhamed
